org.sqlproc.engine
Class SqlPropertiesLoader

java.lang.Object
  org.sqlproc.engine.SqlPropertiesLoader
Deprecated. 

@Deprecated
public class SqlPropertiesLoader
extends Object

The helper class for the property file loading. The property file can be located on the classpath, in the root directory or in the user's home directory. It's used for the purpose of the SqlEngineLoader instance creation.

For more info please see the Tutorials.

Author:
Vladimir Hudec
